text:
April 11, JS51
Mr* Seymour Siegel
Radio Station WNIC
Municipal Building
New York City, New York
Dear Si:
It just occurred to me that you might be snowed under
and would like me to taka the initial material I prepared for
the brochure, add to it Dickâ€™s suggestions and your own, and
get it out for you, I shall be in my office all of next week
but out all of the remainder of the month with the exception
of one or two days* If you could shoot this material right
back at me, I can get it ready and get it printed for the
NAEB Board mooting and the Institute-that is unless you
want to wait until after the Board meets and after the
Institute to ret It out*
Best always*
Sincerely,
Oraydon Ausbwe
Vic e-Fresici ent
Qk/rs
